title: Toxicology Question of the Week
cleaned_text: The Toxicology Question of the Week is a venue that addresses interesting questions that have been asked of the Poison Center or are topics of relevance. The TPC toxicologists and other collaborators will contribute to the Question of the Week. The Question of the Week is overseen by Dr. Donna Seger, Professor Emeritus and the former Executive Director of the Tennessee Poison Center, who developed this resource in 2001. If you wish to be added to the distribution list, please email Ashley
